Text: Criticizing the Bible, my foot! The only reason folks try and belittle the Bible is that it cuts across the sins that they love so much. If they can be convinced that it's not accurate, then the God of the Bible must not exist. That's why there are so many critics. Guess what? You're all wrong! There is a God, a judgment, a time for all sin and sinners to come to an end, and an end to this earthly life as we know it, which is very soon. Those of you who try and look for reasons to doubt the Bible are like kids who think they are hiding by covering they eyes. You're very foolish, for God is not looking for you to punish you, but to save you from the calamity that's just ahead.

I have no fear of the Christian Sky God, and I don't accept man made dogmas about sin. You may be a sinner Tamarind777, but I am not, and I don't blame a mythical devil or Christian Boogie man either. The God of the Bible is a murdering foreskin loving , blood sacrifice ordering bully, trying to whip his foolish believers into shape with the fear of everlasting eternal hell. Do you really really see how crazy all that is. Use you mind and don't hide behind the ridiculousness of "Faith". Christian faith is just a cop out for leaving reason and common sense at the door.
